addCollectionWatchersToSubitemsOf (addCollectionWatchersToSubitemsOf.html)

Adds watchers to each item in the model to perform the "post" when something there changes.

Paramaters

  • addedElements { Array } - The new elements.
  • options { Object } - An options object (as returned by getOptions().
  • options.model { string } - The "singular" version of the model as used by sailsjs.
  • options.prefix { string } - The api prefix to use.
  • options.scopeProperty { string } - The scope property to bind to
